name: places/ChIJW2D3c5v2wokRvI_ySsXzWyc
adrFormatAddress: 2315 Broadway, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Andrea Wang is such an amazing doctor! She is a wealth of knowledge and really cares about the well being of her patients and takes the steps beyond average care to support her patients. She is accessible even after the doctor appointment to make sure her patients are being taken care of properly. Dr. Wang was my tonsillectomy surgeon years ago and remains as my go to doctor for my ENT needs. I appreciate her dedication to the field and to her patients.

originalText.text: Dr. Wang has to be the worst doctor I have ever seen. She completely misdiagnosed a serious health condition, the consequences of which I am still living with. I question her clinical acumen and would not recommend her to anyone.

text.text: Dr. Wang has to be the worst doctor I have ever seen. She completely misdiagnosed a serious health condition, the consequences of which I am still living with. I question her clinical acumen and would not recommend her to anyone.

originalText.text: Dr Wang couldn’t have been nicer! I went to see her for a pretty routine matter, ear wax (embarrassing) and left with improved hearing and the feeling that my ear canals were open for the first time in ages. My voice sounded clearer to me. If you are hesitant about going, just go. It’s so worth it!! Dr Wang is wonderful!

originalText.text: Rude, abrupt and dismissive are the words that best describe my experience with Andrea Wang. She barely made eye contact with me and was pretty callous. She was rough with me and seemed to be in a rush. I waited over an hour to see her and it seems they forgot I was there- when she came in she indicated no one told her she had a patient.

She was rough with me and seemed to be in a rush. I waited over an hour to see her and it seems they forgot I was there- when she came in she indicated no one told her she had a patient.

originalText.text: The office staff was super friendly and Zulaka was efficient and got me scheduled ASAP. The day of the visit I checked in and the clinical staff was prompt and attentive. Dr. Wang was on-time and resolved my issue within minutes. I would absolutely visit this practice again.
